column4: Ubuntu would be radical if I am able to find a variant for my Mac G4.
Vista is nothinig short of a cheap Mac riop-off courtesy of the Evil Empire( MS ).
Nonrate, how would I be able to secure a copy of 7.10 for my G4( Sawetooth )?
I'm not sure, I acutally use openSuse atm but am thinking of using Ubuntu8
